mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cate(cateno, categrpno, name, seqno, visible, rdate, cnt) VALUES(cate_seq.nextval, #{categrpno}, #{name}, #{seqno}, #{visible}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT r.categrpno as r_categrpno, r.name as r_name, c.cateno, c.categrpno, c.name, c.seqno, c.visible, c.rdate, c.cnt FROM categrp r, cate c WHERE (r.categrpno = c.categrpno) AND r.categrpno=#{categrpno} ORDER BY r.categrpno ASC, c.seqno ASC
SELECT cateno, categrpno, name, seqno, visible, rdate, cnt FROM cate WHERE categrpno=#{categrpno} ORDER BY seqno ASC
